title: Historias de UPA Next
overview: Six short fiction stories that will serve, thus, as a preview and link, before the great premiere of 'UPA Next'. Beatriz Luengo, Miguel Ángel Muñoz, Mónica Cruz, Lola Herrera, Lucas Velasco and Marta Guerras star in these stories, along with several of the performers who bring the new students of the Carmen Arranz school to life, such as Almudena Salort, Nuno Gallego Karina Soro and Alex Medina.
